data: The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses organizing a team retreat for the next quarter.
The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses collecting date suggestions between July 10 and July 15 for the retreat.
The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses proposed retreat activities including hiking, workshops, and team-building games.
The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses shortlisted venues of Mountain Lodge Retreat and Lakeside Resort for the retreat.
The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses the team preference for Lakeside Resort due to better facilities and budget compatibility.
The thread 'Team Retreat Planning' discusses action items to finalize the retreat date, book Lakeside Resort, and prepare the retreat agenda.
